name: Word Blitz
description: Type falling neon words before they escape to the bottom — faster words, bigger combos, more chaos!
controls: Keyboard: type the falling words to blast them

name: Neon Slicer
description: Swipe and slash through glowing geometric shapes flying across the screen — chain slices for insane combos, but dodge the red bombs!
tagline: Swipe to slice, dodge the bombs!
controls: Mouse drag / touch swipe to slice shapes

name: Vortex Shift
description: Guide a glowing orb that spirals around a central vortex — click to flip inward/outward and thread through rotating neon barrier arcs before they absorb you!
tagline: Flip the spiral, dodge the rings!
controls: Click / Tap / Space to flip spiral direction

name: Chrono Pop
description: Neon circles expand outward from glowing dots — click them precisely when they hit the dashed target ring for perfect scores and chain combos!
tagline: Pop the ring at the perfect moment!
controls: Click / Tap circles when they hit the target ring

name: Circuit Blaze
description: Drag glowing energy lines to connect matching-colored nodes before their countdown expires — chain combos for massive scores but lose a life every time a node burns out!
tagline: Connect the nodes before they burn out!
controls: Click and drag from one node to a matching-color node to connect

name: Plasma Break
description: Guide a neon paddle to bounce a plasma ball through waves of glowing bricks — chain combo hits for multiplied scores, catch WIDE and MULTIBALL power-ups, and clear every brick to advance!
tagline: Smash bricks, chain combos, break free!
controls: Move mouse or touch to control the paddle

name: Data Dash
description: Navigate a glowing data stream through a cyberpunk grid — collect color-coded data nodes to grow, chain same-color nodes for explosive combo multipliers, and survive as the stream accelerates!
tagline: Grow the stream, chain the combos, don't disconnect!
controls: Arrow keys / WASD to steer, swipe on mobile

name: Echo Pulse
description: A sonar detection game — expanding pulse waves sweep the dark screen revealing hidden neon targets for a brief moment. Click them before they fade back into darkness and chain hits for massive combos!
tagline: Listen to the pulse. Strike before the silence returns.
controls: Click / Tap to hit revealed targets

name: Void Descent
description: Steer a glowing orb through neon barriers that rise from the void below — dodge left and right to thread each gap, collect cyan crystals for bonus points, and survive as speed climbs to breakneck levels!
tagline: Steer through the rising neon. Don't let the void consume you.
controls: ← → or A / D to steer | Tap left or right side on mobile

name: Neon Hopper
description: Hop a glowing diamond across 12 lanes of neon traffic in this frogger-style arcade game — time each move to thread the gaps, reach the goal for a level bonus, and survive as cars grow faster each round!
tagline: Cross the neon lanes. Don't get flattened!
controls: Arrow keys / WASD to hop | Swipe or Tap on mobile

name: Chain Burst
description: Click one floating neon bubble to trigger an explosive chain reaction — the shockwave cascades outward, popping nearby bubbles which then detonate too. Pop enough in one click to advance each level!
tagline: One click. One chain. Pure neon chaos.
controls: Click / Tap a bubble to start the chain reaction

name: Beat Drop
description: A 3-lane rhythm game — neon notes fall down cyan, magenta, and orange lanes in sync with a driving beat. Hit them at the perfect moment using A/S/D keys or tap left/center/right to rack up PERFECT combos!
tagline: Hit the notes. Feel the beat. Don't miss.
controls: A / ← · S / Space · D / → to hit lanes | Tap left, center, right on mobile

name: Neon Flood
description: A color flood-fill strategy game — pick neon colors to flood your territory outward from the corner, absorbing adjacent matching tiles. Capture 60% of the grid before your moves run out!
tagline: Pick a color. Flood the grid. Claim the neon.
controls: Click / Tap color buttons to flood your territory
